page.title: 09ELMDON TRADING ESTATE
page.content: ELMDON TRADING ESTATE IS IN BICKENHILL LANE.IT IS CLOSE TO THE BIRMINGHAM AIRPORT,INTERNATIONAL RAILWAY,M6,M42,A45,M5,AND M1. THE SITE COVERS 45acres AND 43 UNITS.THE AREA HAS BEEN USED AS AN INDUSTRIAL SITE SINCE 1937.THE TWO BIGGEST UNITS ON THE SITE WERE ORIGINALLY AIRCRAFT HANGERS,NOW USED FOR TWO VERY BIG WAREHOUSES.ONE COVERS 162,500 SQUARE Ft,IT IS RENTED BY RENAULT DODGE TRUCKS.40 MILES OF RACKS HOLD THE U.K SUPPLY OF SPARES FOR RENAULT DODGE TRUCKS WORTH Â£9.000000.THE STORAGE RECORDS ARE COMPUTERISED.THE OTHER CONVERTED AIRCRAFT HANGER IS RENTED BY HARRIS. THEY DISTRIBUTE MARS SWEET PRODUCTS TO GREAT BRITAIN.ALL THE OTHER UNITS HAVE BEEN SPECIALLY BUILT AS WAREHOUSES FOR RENT.2000 PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED THERE.
